short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to manage your bookmarks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This bookmark manager is designed to solve the chaos in your bookmarks. 
If you're like most Chrome users, your bookmarks are probably very messy and unorganized. 🤯🤯

This extension will replace your current new tab page with a clean and intuitive interface. Enjoy drag-and-drop functionality, a unique app dock with one-click access to your everyday apps, and a dedicated search bar to find any bookmark with a simple keyboard shortcut. 

There are no useless widgets that nobody cares about, such as time, weather, or random quotes. In this extension, you'll find only the essentials needed in a browser new tab.

Don’t wait any longer — try it out now, it's completely free! 😎✌️✅
